body:
I'm getting a new error on all the daily Cython wheel builds from master:

```
Error compiling Cython file:
------------------------------------------------------------
...
            normalized_dot = (1.0 * (a[0]*b[0] + a[1]*b[1] + a[2]*b[2]) /
                ((a[0]*a[0] + a[1]*a[1] + a[2]*a[2]) * (b[0]*b[0] + b[1]*b[1]+b[2]*b[2])))
            if normalized_dot < min_dot:
                min_dot = normalized_dot
                min_pair = i, j
    return vectors[i], vectors[j]
          ^
------------------------------------------------------------
/Users/travis/build/MacPython/cython-wheels/Cython/Demos/overflow_perf.pyx:151:11: C struct/union member cannot be a memory view
```

https://travis-ci.org/MacPython/cython-wheels/jobs/341016727#L167

https://travis-ci.org/MacPython/cython-wheels/builds/341016724
title: C struct/union member cannot be a memory view on wheel builds
